FuncDef: This command configures matching packets with a specific IP option or a range of IP options in the IP header as an IP filter match criterion.

ParaDef.Info: Enter the 8 bit option-type as a decimal integer. The mask is applied as an AND to the option byte, the result is compared with the option-value. Values-0 to 255.
Specifies a range of option numbers to use as the match criteria. Values-1 to 255 (decimal). ParamDefault: Default- 255 (decimal) (exact match)
